title: Inboxfewer Helm Chart Values
description: Schema for validating Inboxfewer Helm chart values

tag.description: Image tag (defaults to chart appVersion if empty)

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets for private registries

name.description: Name of the image pull secret

fullnameOverride.description: Override the full name of resources

automount.description: Automatically mount the ServiceAccount API credentials

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the ServiceAccount

name.description: Name of the ServiceAccount (generated if not set)

loadBalancerIP.description: Load balancer IP (when type is LoadBalancer)

gatewayAPI.description: Gateway API configuration for HTTPRoute and BackendTrafficPolicy

parentRefs.description: Parent gateway references (required when gatewayAPI.enabled is true)

sectionName.description: SectionName is the name of a section within the target Gateway

port.description: Port is the network port to match

rules.description: Routing rules (optional, defaults to a single PathPrefix '/' rule)

type.description: Filter type (e.g., RequestHeaderModifier, ResponseHeaderModifier, RequestRedirect, URLRewrite)

enabled.description: Enable BackendTrafficPolicy creation (requires gatewayAPI.enabled to also be true)

volumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts for the container

baseURL.description: Public base URL for OAuth callbacks

yolo.description: Enable write operations (default: false for read-only mode)

allowPublicClientRegistration.description: Allow unauthenticated dynamic client registration (WARNING: weakens security)

registrationAccessToken.description: Registration access token required for client registration

encryptionKey.description: AES-256 encryption key for token storage (32 bytes, base64 encoded)

allowInsecureAuthWithoutState.description: Allow authorization without state parameter (WARNING: weakens CSRF protection)

maxClientsPerIP.description: Maximum clients that can be registered per IP address

allowLocalhostRedirectURIs.description: Allow http://localhost and http://127.0.0.1 redirect URIs

allowPrivateIPRedirectURIs.description: Allow private IP addresses in redirect URIs (WARNING: enables SSRF)

allowLinkLocalRedirectURIs.description: Allow link-local addresses in redirect URIs (WARNING: cloud metadata risk)

disableDNSValidation.description: Disable DNS validation of redirect URI hostnames

disableAuthorizationTimeValidation.description: Disable redirect URI validation at authorization time

trustedPublicRegistrationSchemes.description: Trusted URI schemes for unauthenticated client registration

disableStrictSchemeMatching.description: Disable strict scheme matching for trusted scheme registration

allowPrivateIPs.description: Allow CIMD metadata URLs that resolve to private IPs (WARNING: reduces SSRF protection)

trustedAudiences.description: Trusted audiences for SSO token forwarding. When configured, tokens with these audience claims are validated via JWKS signature verification, enabling SSO from upstream aggregators.

allowPrivateIPs.description: Allow JWKS endpoints to resolve to private IPs during SSO token validation. Required for private IdP deployments (e.g., Dex on internal networks). WARNING: reduces SSRF protection. Has no effect for Google OAuth (JWKS is always public). Note: Requires future mcp-oauth support for AllowPrivateIPJWKS.

caSecretKey.description: Key in secret containing CA certificate

secretKeyPassword.description: Key in secret containing Valkey password

existingSecret.description: Existing secret containing TLS certificate and key

mountPath.description: Path where TLS files will be mounted

logoURL.description: Logo URL displayed on the success page (must be HTTPS)

logoAlt.description: Alt text for the logo image

title.description: Title displayed on the success page

message.description: Message shown below the title (use {{.AppName}} placeholder)

primaryColor.description: Primary/accent color for buttons (CSS color value)

existingSecret.description: Existing secret containing Google OAuth credentials

type.description: Service type for metrics (keep as ClusterIP for security)

otlpInsecure.description: Use insecure connection for OTLP (WARNING: never enable in production)

includePII.description: Include full email addresses (PII) in audit logs

for.description: Duration the condition must be true
